description:
Yugi, fed up with Noa’s treachery, takes Kaiba’s place in the duel.  However, for every turn that passes, one of Yugi’s friends is transformed into stone!  As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noa before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 引き継ぎし山札[デッキ]遊戯VS乃亜
